body_content.explanation:
short for 
generative AI : the use or study of artificial intelligences (= computer systems that have some of the qualities that a human brain has, such as the ability to interpret language, recognize images, and learn from data supplied to them) that are able to produce text, images, etc.:
examples: GenAI could help automate mundane tasks.
Data quality and responsible implementation are two challenges often associated with GenAI.

body_content.explanation:
short for 
generative AI : a particular artificial intelligence (= a computer system that has some of the qualities that a human brain has, such as the ability to interpret language, recognize images, and learn from data supplied to it) that is able to produce text, images, etc.:
examples: Workshop participants recognized the importance of understanding the capabilities of the GenAI.
The company is interested in estimating the costs and value of training a genAI.
